What exactly is Sunhawk doing right now? Cause it seems that you've 
got him doing two things.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Megatron --
> 
> Megatron watches Sunhawk leap upward, drawing an energon sword, 
and 
> laughs, "Hah, foolish Maximal, what do you expect to hit with slow 
> moves like that?" He barrel rolls right; a blur cutting past the 
> Sunhawk in mid air avoiding the sword.
> 
> "Megatron, TERRORIZE!" Megatron transforms quickly, and hits the 
> ground diagonally on his feet, sliding for a few metres.
> 
> "You attack me like you want to throw away your life," Megatron 
> sneers, as he raises his plasma gun at Sunhawk. "Then die!" He 
fires 
> two plasma blasts in quick succession, and draws his energon 
bladed 
> alloy axe.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > Sunhawk reconizes the bot on sight.
> > 
> > Sunhawk:  MEGATROOOOONNNN!
> > 
> > He rushes forward.  His energon sword comes out of
> > it's wrist compartment and ignites.  He jumps several
> > feet in the air meeting Megatron head-on and slashes
> > at his head.
> > 
> > OOC: In the unlikely event this is an extended battle
> > with the good guy (if Sunhawk qualifies) winning and
> > in the more unlikely event that this rpg is found by a
> > Mainframe employee and turned into a cartoon this
> > would probably be the part where they play "You got
> > the touch" or maybe in a minute or two "Dare".
> >
